code: var useDate=function useDate(date){var fullDate=new Date(date.replaceAll("-","/"));var year=fullDate.getFullYear();var month=fullDate.getMonth()+1;var day=fullDate.getDate();var dateFormated=month.toString().padStart(2,"0")+"/"+day.toString().padStart(2,"0")+"/"+year;return dateFormated;};export default useDate;
